If you wish to try it, please contact us
"1.Class files are not displayed on the teacher\'s homepage; \n 2.Unable to view class progress after archiving; \n 3. Cannot setup study plan for the class, assign homework, organize examination, release resource, etc.\n 4. Student account will no longer show the class;\n 5. Archived classes can be restored by cancelling archiving." 1.After exercise, you will upload your last recording. There will be data traffic incurred during uploading. It is recommended that you practice under the WIFI environment。 2.Able to practice without network access, but your recording cannot be uploaded. After having access to network, click on the synchronous learning record, your recording and learning records will be uploaded synchronously。
